bug.description:
/kind bug
[A clear and concise description of what the bug is.] I deployed kubeflow V0.7 on my k8s cluster , But it caused a series of problems, gitlab and harbor services are abnormal, see the picture for the problemã€‚ <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22021811/68640786-c0929100-0543-11ea-9897-b8cd3a7f637e.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>kubectl get mutatingwebhookconfigurations NAME CREATED AT admission-webhook-mutating-webhook-configuration 2019-11-12T02:30:57Z inferenceservice.serving.kubeflow.org 2019-11-12T02:31:53Z istio-sidecar-injector 2019-09-06T03:55:39Z katib-mutating-webhook-config 2019-11-12T02:32:20Z mutating-webhook-configuration 2019-11-12T02:31:28Z </denchmark-code>
I delete inferenceservice.serving.kubeflow.org admission-webhook-mutating-webhook-configuration katib-mutating-webhook-config mutating-webhook-configuration , gitlab and harbor service back to normal. Environment:
Kubeflow version: v0.7.0 kfctl version: v0.7.0 Kubernetes platform: Rancher v2.1 Kubernetes version: V1.14.2 OS ubuntu 18.04
